mapper.select: SELECT BUY.BUY_CODE , DETAIL.ITEM_CODE , BUY_CNT , TOTAL_PRICE , ITEM_NAME , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , BUY_DATE , BUY_PRICE FROM buy_detail DETAIL INNER JOIN shop_item ITEM ON DETAIL.ITEM_CODE = ITEM.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN item_image IMG ON IMG.ITEM_CODE = ITEM.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN shop_buy BUY ON BUY.BUY_CODE = DETAIL.BUY_CODE WHERE IS_MAIN = 'Y' AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
